# Wiederholung zur Pfeife


```{r}
mariokart %>% 
  select(total_pr)
```

Ist synonym zu:

```{r}
select(mariokart, total_pr)
```



# Setup

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(DataExplorer)
```


```{r}
mariokart <- read.csv("https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/openintro/mariokart.csv")
```


# Dichtediagramm

```{r}
mariokart %>% 
  select(total_pr) %>% 
  plot_density()
```
